Package com.pandora.general.objects.services.abstractions.classes

package com.pandora.general.objects.services.abstractions.classes
Provides abstract classes for services related to biogeochemistry and freshwaters in PANDORA. These classes define abstractions for handling CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on objects within a map-based context, as well as generating hash codes for entities based on specific properties.

The package includes the following classes:

  • AbstractMapCrudService:

    An abstract class implementing CRUD operations using a map-based storage.

  • AbstractHashMapService:

    An abstract class providing a method for generating hash codes based on a Cell and LocalDateTime.

These abstractions are designed to be extended and implemented in specific contexts within PANDORA for managing and manipulating data related to biogeochemistry in freshwater environments.

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractBaseMapCrudService<T extends AbstractBaseObject>
    The AbstractBaseMapCrudService is an abstract class extending the AbstractMapCrudService and providing additional functionality for managing AbstractBaseObject entities.
    AbstractHashMapService
    The AbstractHashMapService is an abstract class providing common functionality for services that utilize a hash map to store data based on the combination of a Cell and a LocalDateTime.
    AbstractMapCrudService<T,ID>
    The AbstractMapCrudService is an abstract class implementing the CrudService interface for managing entities using a Map as the underlying storage.
